relations.target: palm: the inner surface of the hand from the wrist to the base of the fingers <i66158>
face: the front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear; 'he washed his face'; 'I wish I had seen the look on his face when he got the news' <i66344>
gesture: motion of hands or body to emphasize or help to express a thought or feeling <i37168>

senses.definition: the act of putting your hand to cover your face to show disappointment or despair
